m_szDocTitle: Quick Drive: Toyota Mirai Fuel Cell Feels Like the Future
m_szDocSumamry: Quick Drive: Toyota Mirai Fuel Cell Feels Like the Future Reddit Source: Toyota Toyota Mirai, the first mass-produced hydrogen fuel cell vehicle to go on sale in the U.S., had something of an East Coast coming-out party at NYIAS 2016. On Day Two of the event, Mirai nabbed the World Green Car award , edging the new Prius which placed second and Chevy Volt, which notched a distant third. Meanwhile, Toyota has two test cars available to journalists at the event, and we took a quick drive in the car that indeed feels like the future.
